mapper.insert: insert into scrraw SELECT `stagingscrraw`.`Material`, `stagingscrraw`.`Description`, sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`QII(NERP)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`QII(3PL)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`QIIGAP`,',','')), sum(replace( `stagingscrraw`.`UNS(NERP)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`UNS(3PL)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`UNSGAP`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`BLK(NERP)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`BLK(3PL)`,',','')), sum(replace( `stagingscrraw`.`BLKGAP`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`Total(NERP)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`Total(3PL)`,',','')), sum(replace(`stagingscrraw`.`TotGap`,',','')), `stagingscrraw`.`Plnt`, `stagingscrraw`.`SLoc`, `stagingscrraw`.`valType`, `stagingscrraw`.`Date` FROM `stagingscrraw` group by Material,SLoc,`Plnt`,valType,`Date`,`Description`;

insert into scr_nerp SELECT `material`, `plnt`, `sloc`, `Mvt`, `movement_type_text`, `special_stock`, `reference`, `mat_doc`, `post_date`, `post_time`, `entry_date`, sum(`qty`) as qty, `username`, `doc_header`, `val_type` FROM `stg_scr_nerp` group by `material`, `plnt`, `sloc`, `Mvt`, `movement_type_text`, `special_stock`, `reference`, `mat_doc`, `post_date`, `post_time`, `entry_date`, `username`, `doc_header`, `val_type` ;
mapper.select: select b.`material`, b.`plnt`, b.`sloc`, b.`mvt`, b.`movement_type_text`, b.`special_stock`, b.`reference`, b.`mat_doc`, b.`post_date`, date_format(time( date_sub(timestamp(str_to_date(`entry_date`,'%m/%d/%Y'),post_time), interval 15 Hour)) ,'%H:%i:%s') as `post_time`, Date(date_sub(timestamp(str_to_date(`entry_date`,'%m/%d/%Y'),post_time), interval 15 Hour)) as `entry_date`, b.`qty`, b.`username`, b.`doc_header`, b.`val_type` from scr_item_activity a right join scr_nerp b on a.`reference` = b. `reference` and a.item = b.material and a.slot = b.sloc where b.reference !='' and b.sloc = #{sloc} and b.material = #{sku} and str_to_date(`post_date`,'%m/%d/%Y') between #{start} and #{end} and a.item is null;

select SLoc as sloc, cast(sum(abs(groupGap) * if(Sloc= 'WR2E',ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)/2,ifnull(b.mapPrice,0))) as decimal(10,2)) as absolute_gap_cost, cast(sum((groupGap) * if(Sloc= 'WR2E',ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)/2,ifnull(b.mapPrice,0))) as decimal(10,2)) as net_gap_cost, sum(abs(groupGap) ) as absolute_gap, sum(groupGap) as `net_gap`, cast(sum(if(abs(groupGap)> 0,1,0))/count(1) * 100 as decimal(10,2)) as `sku_with_error`, sum(if(abs(groupGap) > 0,1,0)) as `sku_with_error_number`, cast(sum(if(groupGap > 0, groupGap * if(Sloc= 'WR2E',ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)/2,ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)),0)) as decimal(10,2)) as `nerp_overage`, cast(sum(if(groupGap < 0,groupGap * if(Sloc= 'WR2E',ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)/2,ifnull(b.mapPrice,0)),0)) as decimal(10,2)) as `synapse_overage` from (select Material, Sloc,`Date`,sum(`Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)`) as groupGap from scrraw group by Material, Sloc,`Date`) a left join price b on a.Material = b.Material where str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) group by Sloc;

select a.Material as material ,a.Description as description ,`Total(3PL)` as `synapse_total`,`Total(NERP)` as `nerp_total`, TotGap as total_gap, TotGap * ifnull(b.mapPrice,0) as abs_map_value, `Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)` as net_gap, (`Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)`) * ifnull(b.mapPrice,0) as net_gap_map_value,sloc from scrraw a left join price b on a.Material = b.Material where SLoc = #{sloc} and TotGap > 0 and str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) order by TotGap desc;

select a.Material as material ,a.Description as description ,`Total(3PL)` as `synapse_total`,`Total(NERP)` as `nerp_total`, TotGap as total_gap, TotGap * ifnull(b.mapPrice/2,0) as abs_map_value, `Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)` as net_gap, (`Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)`) * ifnull(b.mapPrice/2,0) as net_gap_map_value,sloc from scrraw a left join price b on a.Material = b.Material where SLoc = 'WR2E' and str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) and a.Material in (select Material from ( select Material,sum(`Total(NERP)` - `Total(3PL)`) as groupGap from scrraw where SLoc = 'WR2E' and str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) group by Material) x where groupGap != 0 ) order by TotGap desc ;

select a.material as material, `Description` as description, `QII(NERP)` as qi_nerp, `QII(3PL)` as qi3pl, `QIIGAP` as qi_gap, `UNS(NERP)`as uns_nerp, `UNS(3PL)` as uns3pl, `UNSGAP` as uns_gap, `BLK(NERP)` as blk_nerp, `BLK(3PL)` as blk3pl, `BLKGAP` as blkGap, `Total(NERP)` as total_nerp, `Total(3PL)` as total3pl, `TotGap` as total_gap, `SLoc` as sloc, `valType` as val_type, `Date` as `date`, ifnull(b.mapPrice/2 * TotGap ,'999') as `absolute_gap_value` from scrraw a left join price b on a.Material = b.Material where SLoc = 'WR2E' and str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) order by TotGap desc ;

select a.material as material, `Description` as description, `QII(NERP)` as qi_nerp, `QII(3PL)` as qi3pl, `QIIGAP` as qi_gap, `UNS(NERP)`as uns_nerp, `UNS(3PL)` as uns3pl, `UNSGAP` as uns_gap, `BLK(NERP)` as blk_nerp, `BLK(3PL)` as blk3pl, `BLKGAP` as blkGap, `Total(NERP)` as total_nerp, `Total(3PL)` as total3pl, `TotGap` as total_gap, `SLoc` as sloc, `valType` as val_type, `Date` as `date`, ifnull(cast(if(a.valType = 'C',b.mapPrice/2,b.mapPrice) * TotGap as decimal(10,2)),'999') as `absolute_gap_value` from scrraw a left join price b on a.Material = b.Material where SLoc = #{sloc} and str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval #{date} Day) order by TotGap desc;

select Material as material, sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 15 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day15` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 14 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day14` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 13 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day13` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 12 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day12` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 11 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day11` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 10 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day10` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 9 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day9` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 8 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day8` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 7 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day7` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 6 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day6` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 5 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day5` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 4 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day4` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 3 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day3` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 2 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day2` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 1 Day),TotGap,0)) as `day1` , sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = current_date(),TotGap,0)) as `today`, sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = current_date(),TotGap,0)) - sum(if( str_to_date(`Date`,'%m/%d/%Y') = date_sub(current_date(), Interval 1 Day),TotGap,0)) as `dod` from scrraw where SLoc = #{sloc} and TotGap > 0 group by Material;
